entry.title: Re On FTX's Risk Management system: Absolutely false. There was no sophistication. There was an absence of risk management.
entry.summary: Re On FTX's Risk Management system: Absolutely false. There was no sophistication. There was an absence of risk management.

entry.title: Re John Ray on being worse than Enron: There is no record-keeping whatsoever. Employees would communicate invoices and expenses on Slack. They use Qui...
entry.summary: Re John Ray on being worse than Enron: There is no record-keeping whatsoever. Employees would communicate invoices and expenses on Slack. They use Quickbooks. A multi-billion dollar company. There is no independent board. That is highly unusual.

entry.title: Re On the loans givens to SBF: The loans givens to SBF was not just one loan but numerous loans. There is no description of the purpose of the loan. I...
entry.summary: Re On the loans givens to SBF: The loans givens to SBF was not just one loan but numerous loans. There is no description of the purpose of the loan. In one instance, he is signed both as issuer and recipient of the loan....

entry.title: Re "...Bankman-Fried stated privately that he was pursuing an aggressive acquisition strategy during this time... in part to gain access to additional...
entry.summary: Re "...Bankman-Fried stated privately that he was pursuing an aggressive acquisition strategy during this time... in part to gain access to additional sources of capital that could be used to support his existing businesses and fill the hole in customer funds that had been created."

entry.title: Re “FTX Trading executives also created other exceptions… that allowed Alameda to have an unfair advantage when transacting on the platform, includi...
entry.summary: Re “FTX Trading executives also created other exceptions… that allowed Alameda to have an unfair advantage when transacting on the platform, including quicker execution times and an exemption from the platform's distinctive auto-liquidation risk management process.”

entry.title: Re “At Bankman-Fried's direction, FTX executives created features in the underlying code for FTX that allowed Alameda to maintain an essentially unli...
entry.summary: Re “At Bankman-Fried's direction, FTX executives created features in the underlying code for FTX that allowed Alameda to maintain an essentially unlimited line of credit on FTX.”
